title: account hacked?
body: So a few days ago I had remade my password, i dint forget the password but i couldn't get into my account so i tried to remake my password again and for some reason the email i had used a few days ago wasn't working so i decided to see what was going on by sending usernames associated with that email to my yahoo and my username wasn't there it was my secondary account and that was it even though 5 days prior to this i had my main account on that email and have not changed the email associated with the account.

replies.body: I first recommend double checking your spam folder in case your emails were put in there.  If you need any help recovering your account, just hit us up through an [account recovery ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416).  Our account team will help you individually, and get to the bottom of this!

Oh shoot, that really sucks, mate! Let's get this all sorted out by setting you up with one of our account recovery specialists. If you submit a support ticket with [**this form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and provide as much information as you can recall, we'd be happy to assist further.
